name: Pineford: Part I
storyline:
Pineford has been rocked by disaster: everyone's favourite aristocrat, Evie Roots, has been found dead. This place far from the civilised world seems quiet and peaceful… but only at first glance.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a provincial town in a Victorian world setting. Pineford survived the plague epidemic, rebellions and intrigues of the ruling families. It is in your hands to put all the events in place and understand how they led to such a high-profile murder.
summary: Investigate the murder of Evie Roots. Save the town from disaster. Learn the history of the Great Houses. Immerse yourself in the centuries-old history of Pineford.
